MAke sure you get ALL files... hidden etc...  Also make a full backup while you are doing that...
Quick, easy, three lines in a terminal...
sudo su.... your pass....  cd space /.....   then.. wait for it....
tar cvpzf backup.tgz --exclude=/backup.tgz --exclude=/proc --exclude=/lost+found  --exclude=/mnt --exclude=/sys --exclude=/media --exclude=/root/.Trash -- /
If you just want to backup your home  change the last "/" to "/home"
I backup with one line tar command in a terminal
